title: Optical character recognition
caption: Revolutionizing AI with tools for the next wave of transformation
overview: The OCR technology converts virtually any kind of documents, such as scanned paper documents, PDF files or images captured by a digital camera into machine-readable text data which is editable and searchable.  It saves you a lot of time and effort when creating, processing and repurposing various documents. We have developed this for various processes like Forms processing, Loan processing, Transcript processing, Invoice processing etc.
